proposed_parameters.reason: Limit horizontal speed for stability in gusty wind conditions near the building
Control ascent speed to avoid sudden altitude changes near the structure
Gentle descent to reduce oscillations and maintain stable altitude
Moderate horizontal acceleration for smoother trajectory tracking in wind
Avoid aggressive climbs that could destabilize the drone in wind
Stable descents to maintain control near the building
Set return-to-launch altitude above the 200m building with margin for safety
Allow vertical envelope to accommodate the building height during mission
Safe takeoff altitude before approaching the tall structure
